report.name: eSynthGlobMetier

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT tcs.ANNEE ANNEE, tcs.CLISIGLE CLISIGLE, trim(tcs.METIER) METIER, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_ARBDECIDES),0)) JH_ARBDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_ARBDECIDES),0)) EU_ARBDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_CANTDECIDES),0)) JH_CANTDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_CANTDECIDES),0) ) EU_CANTDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_REALISES),0)) JH_REALISES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_REALISES),0)) EU_REALISES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_EXTRAPOLES),0)) JH_EXTRAPOLES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_EXTRAPOLES),0)) EU_EXTRAPOLES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_REESTIMES),0)) JH_REESTIMES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_REESTIMES),0)) EU_REESTIMES
FROM TMP_COPI_SYNTHESE_ETATS tcs where numseq = :p_numseq group by tcs.annee, tcs.clisigle, trim(tcs.metier)

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select:
select sum(round(JH_ARBDECIDES)) Total_JH_ARB, sum(round(EU_ARBDECIDES)) Total_EU_ARB, sum(round(JH_CANTDECIDES)) Total_JH_CANT, sum(round(EU_CANTDECIDES)) Total_EU_CANT, sum(round(JH_REALISES)) Total_JH_REAL, sum(round(EU_REALISES)) Total_EU_REAL, sum(round(JH_EXTRAPOLES)) Total_JH_EXTRA, sum(round(EU_EXTRAPOLES)) Total_EU_EXTRA, sum(round(JH_REESTIMEs)) Total_JH_REES, sum(round(EU_REESTIMEs)) Total_EU_RESS, trim(metier), annee from tmp_copi_synthese_etats where dp_copi = 'DP3' and numseq = :p_numseq group by trim(metier), annee
order by annee, trim(metier)

dataSource.name: Q_3
dataSource.select: select cmensuelle from calendrier where add_months(trunc(sysdate,'MM'),-1) = calanmois
